ARABIC: وَإِسْمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدْرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ كُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Ismail and Idris and Dhu'l-Kifl - each one was among the steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Remember) Ishmael, Edris and Dhu'l-Kifl. They were men of fortitude,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And (We bestowed the same favour) upon Ishmael, Idris and Dhu al-Kifl, for they were all steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Ismael, Idris and Dhul Kifl all were people of great patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Ismail, and Idrees, and Zul-Kifl; they were all patiently enduring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) Isma`il, Idris and Dhul-Kifl: All were from among the patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Ismail and Idris and Zulkifl; all were of the patient ones;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Ishmael, Idris, Dhul Kifl -- each was of the patient,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (mention) Ishmael, and Idris, and Dhu'l-Kifl. All were of the steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Remember Ishmael and Idris and Dhul Kifl: they were all patient and steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Isma'il and ldris and Zul-Kifl! each were of the patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And [remember] Ishmael, Idris, and Dhul-Kifl—each of them was among the patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (remember) Isma'il, Idris, and Zul-kifl, all (men) of constancy and patience;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) Isma'il (Ishmael), and Idris (Enoch) and Dhul-Kifl (Isaiah), all were from among As-Sabirin (the patient ones, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Ishmael, Idris, and ThulKifl (the son of Job) each were patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Ishmael, and Enoch, and Ezekiel; each was one of the steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:85] And, mention, Ishmael and Idrīs and Dhū’l-Kifl — all were of the patient, in [maintaining] obedience to God and staying away from acts of disobedience to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (mention) Ishmael, and Idris, and Dhu'l-Kifl. All were of the steadfast) in fulfilling Allah's commands and avoiding all evil deeds.
